list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a covering for all or part of the face, worn as a disguise, or to amuse or terrify other people.

a covering made of fiber or gauze and fitting over the nose and mouth to protect against dust or air pollutants, or made of sterile gauze and worn to prevent infection of the wearer or (in surgery) of the patient.
a cosmetic preparation spread over the face and left for some time to cleanse and improve the skin.
a likeness of a person's face in clay or wax, especially one made by taking a mold from the face.
a manner or expression that hides one's true character or feelings; a pretense.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she let her mask of moderate respectability slip
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy để mặt nạ của cô ấy uy quy vừa phải trượt

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a piece of something, such as a card, used to cover a part of an image that is not required when exposing a print.
a patterned metal film used in the manufacture of microcircuits to allow selective modification of the underlying material.
the enlarged lower lip of a dragonfly larva, which can be extended to seize prey.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he had been masked, bound, and abducted
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta đã bị che giấu, bị ràng buộc và bị bắt cóc
Các poplars đeo mặt nạ một nhà máy

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cover (an object or surface) so as to protect it from a process, especially painting.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: mask off doors and cupboards with sheets of plastic
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Mặt nạ ngoài trời và tủ với tấm nhựa
